resources.string: Made by a couple of nerds for a university project

Game coded by Sander B. Knudsen and Marcus L. Jensen for the SDU course 'Android Programmering'.

Uses the LibGDX game library. The following asset packs are used for sprites:

UI: Iron Theme by Admurin
Shikashis Fantasy Icons Pack by Cheekyinkling
Dungeon Tileset II by 0x73.

All asset packs sourced from Itch.io
